Julia and Lily both agreed to go into the left side door so both ladies got up and slowly waddled over to it.They both entered and the door shut behind them and *click* locked.

"Guess we won't head back into there again unless someone unlocks it or something."Julia said.

Julia and Lily saw this new room was lit up brightly and has a few medical beds and some cupboards.Lily takes a look at the cupboards inside was a lot of vials.All the vials were the same though.They all contained a pink chemical.Labeled Preg-hancer.Lily took two out and gave one to Julia.Julia asks Lily will this help them.Lily thinks for a while and shrugs.Lily drinks her vial and then lies on the bed and moans as she feels her womb becoming more stretchy and being able to hold more children.Julia does the same too.Now both ladies can hold up to 22 babies in their womb.The suits only downside is once it senses the wearer is at maximum capacity, it would initiate birth immediately however it will allow the wearer to carry as many babies that is below the wearer's body capacity without the risk of birth.So Lily and Julia can carry up to 22 babies without giving birth unless they exceed the limit.

Then Julia and Lily decide that they should transfer some babies off Lily and into Julia, Julia rests on the bed while Lily uses the transferal machine she carries around on her belly.The machine zaps her belly and sucks out 2 babies, Lily's belly becomes smaller.Afterwards, she zaps Julia's belly and her belly surges out and now Julia carries 11 babies and Lily has 10.They then see some stairs leading upstairs, both ladies struggled but managed to climb the stairs and soon see a room with a door and a shackled lady.The room had some hammers and Julia and Lily quickly broke the shackles and free the young lady.The lady thanks them.

"My name is Julia and thats Lily."Julia introduces herself and Lily.

"Thank you, my name is Brenda and I am a locksmith."Brenda says.

"Well Brenda, your not pregnant are you?" Lily asks.

Brenda shakes her head.

"Well we need to transfer some babies into you is that ok?"Lily asks.

Brenda nods.Lily zaps out two babies out of herself and two out of Julia and zaps the naked belly of Brenda.Brenda's breast expanded to F cups and her belly surged out to a full term quadruplet sized belly.The trio now waddled into the other room which has a checkpoint inside.Brenda got scanned and the trio rested.The trio then chatted for a bit.Brenda also got suited into the same suits the other two wore, she can now hold up to 20 children without birth.There is an elevator up and another door out to another room.
1322122122.title: The left side door

info.brief_description: Your a pregnant woman in the maze with a crazy scientist.
info.description:
You are a pregnant woman in the maze made by a crazy scientist.He watches you at all times.If you give birth you are returned to the maze pregnant again.Serums and chemicals can be found in the maze.

*I will mainly add to Julia's story so look at that if you don't know what to add, take a look at that story.The other story lines do not need to coincide with each other and the other two characters stories are mostly empty so you can decide their fates but make sure there is a way for them to survive.

Rules
-Keep the character female
-If she gives birth she faints and returns conscious and pregnant again...
-No death unless it's the end but add a way for her to survive
-Companions can be added and the same rules above applies to them.

Enjoy. :D
